SELECT_CONNECTION_TYPE: Select the Connection type you want to use:
INSERT_DIE_NUMBER: Select the die you want to place
INSERT_COLUMN: In which column do you want to place the Die?
INSERT_ROW: In which row do you want to place the Die?
INSERT_TOOL_NUMBER: Insert the number of the Tool card you want to use
CHOOSE_WINDOW_CARD: Choose the Window that best fits your Private Objective. Be smart!
NEW_DIE_VALUE: Select the die you want to change:
COLUMN_DIE_TO_MOVE: Insert the column of the die you want to move:
ROW_DIE_TO_MOVE: Insert the row of the die you want to move:
COLUMN_WHERE_TO_PLACE: In which column do you want to place the die?
ROW_WHERE_TO_PLACE: In which row do you want to place the die?
ONE_INCREASE_TWO_DECREASE:
1) To increase value by 1
2) To decrease value by 1
NOT_ENOUGH_TOKENS: You can't use this toolcard! You don't have enough tokens!
CHOOSE_YOUR_MOVE:
ACTIONS YOU CAN PERFORM:
1- Place Die
2- Use Toolcard
3- Skip turn
CHOOSE_MINI_MOVE:
ACTIONS YOU CAN PERFORM:
1- Place Die
2- Skip turn
CHOOSE_MINI_CHOICE:
ACTIONS YOU CAN PERFORM:
1- Use Toolcard
2- Skip turn
ALERT_MESSAGE: Insert a valid connection type and username please.
SELECTION_MESSAGE:
You selected the Window Card. Waiting for the other players. 
Good Luck!
